Articles.Content:
<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/0ff9377afa68dc3ad3fe6844aaf1bd38/tumblr_inline_n3di71jWy71rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/02b1766cd0105c3cf74eb746b33ba181/tumblr_inline_n3diljJvED1rr2wit.png"/></p>

<p>We hope you don’t mind, but devnotes are off this week. Between the hectic schedule of getting the <em><strong>ARM</strong></em> update out and now having to make some more tweaks to it, we hope you’ll forgive us having to skip the devnotes this week.</p>

<p>Don’t worry - next week, we’ll be back with roses in hand. For now though, enjoy <em><strong>Kerbal Space Program: Asteroid Redirect Mission</strong></em>.</p>
Good work, guys, get some sleep!
Yes sir! I shall enjoy it too! Nice prank... "Yeah we'll release it sometime in April .____."

ItÃ‚Â¡s already out?!?!?!

Then what the hell am I doing wasting the valuable time I could be expending playing it?

Also, great work, guys, you worked really hard with this one, hope you get some rest after the release, as this will keep us entertained for a long time.
Aww hell yeah! You guys are awesome! NASA is awesome! Everything is awesome!
April first is technically in April, nice one Squad, you had us there.
Thanks SQUAD! Take a little time to get some sleep like regex said!

Thanks. I wonder just what you're planning for 0.24. It seems that ARM contains most of the exciting stuff that were supposed to come with it. I wonder if there's anything else planned besides contracts.
You missed the chance to say KSP was "ARMed and ready" but we'll let that pass.
Best news of the year. Thanks, squad!

The ARM-Update contains so much fun.

Thanks Squad

Wow, I just downloaded it....

OPTIMIZATIONS!!!!!!!

WOW! I've never seen KSP run this smooth. Ever. I am very impressed! It totally made the wait worth it!

Thanks a bunch SQUAD!

Wow, I just downloaded it....

OPTIMIZATIONS!!!!!!!

WOW! I've never seen KSP run this smooth. Ever. I am very impressed! It totally made the wait worth it!

Thanks a bunch SQUAD!

I know! I was shocked at the FPS and SMOOTHness I got!

and now having to make some more tweaks to it

so, we will ge some bugfix?
ARM was released? Didn't notice, stupid time-eating AoW3.
I am really happy the patch is out although I did not have to play with it much yet, but I still miss the devnote. I was hoping we might get to know what was behind the delay...

Aww hell yeah! You guys are awesome! NASA is awesome! Everything is awesome!

Everything is cool when you're part of a SQUAD!
Ok, I entered my e-mail and password in the patcher, pressed OK and it's all grayed out now for at least 10 minutes.
Nice surprise coming back from school. I guess my homework can wait for a couple of weeks xD

Great to know, can not wait to actually play it.

Got it on my laptop, and so far most of my mods seem alright (updated KAS and removed Joint Reinforcement)

Optimizations wise, I am impressed :-)
I ain't mad. Go do whatever.

Launching stuff hasn't been as fun as ever before. The huge parts and smooth, NASA-style engines definitely do their job.

Launching these monsters in incredibly smooth! I am so happy with this update! Squad, thank you for everything.

Thankfully, my plugins work too....

Okay guys, one question: Where is the ARM grabbling-Device itself? I use the actual Version (patched by steam 30min ago) and all new parts are there. Execept the ARM.

To be honest, i use a whole bunch of mods. But i don't find the part on the filesystem, either.

So: How is the Config-File for the ARM-Device called?
Just like to add my thanks ~ best update yet.
The device is under Utility and is called the Advanced Grabbing Unit!
